text: The 2017–18 season was Sheffield United's 129th season in their history and marked their return to the Championship, following a six-year stay in the third tier. Along with the Championship, the club also competed in the FA Cup and EFL Cup. A home tie was to follow in the second round, with Leicester City the visitors. ==References== Category:Sheffield United F.C. seasons Sheffield United
title: 2017–18 Sheffield United F.C. season
